abstract: Updated: Cablevision announced Monday that it will buy Bresnan Communications for $1.365 billion in cash and will begin a share repurchase program of up to $500 million.
snippet: Updated: Cablevision announced Monday that it will buy Bresnan Communications for $1.365 billion in cash and will begin a share repurchase program of up to $500 million.
lead_paragraph: 7:48 a.m. | Updated Cablevision on Monday announced that it will acquire Bresnan Communications for $1.365 billion. It also announced a share buyback of up to $500 million.

headline.main: Cablevision Strikes $1.36 Billion Deal for Bresnan

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
